thread.title_full: EastEnders spoilers: New pictures reveal the moment Michelle Fowler’s big secret is revealed

author: Duncan Lindsay
title: EastEnders spoilers: New pictures reveal the moment Michelle Fowler’s big secret is revealed
text:
(Picture: BBC) EastEnders have revealed new images from the upcoming scenes which show Michelle Fowler finally divulge her big secret in Sharon Mitchell in a special episode which focuses entirely on their friendship and the associated storylines. 
Sharon already has a lot on her mind, having overheard the massive secret that Denise Fox’s baby is Phil’s. But as she finds Michelle clearly upset outside, a heart to heart ensues with both women opening up about their lives.
And it soon becomes clear to Sharon that there is a very big reason why Michelle is reluctant to go back home.
(Picture: BBC) As Michelle confides a criminal secret in her friend, Sharon is left shocked – but what will the consequences be as the truth about Michelle’s return is finally revealed?

EastEnders airs these scenes on Thursday 12th January at 7:30pm on BBC One. 
MORE: EastEnders spoilers: New clip reveals Sharon Mitchell on the warpath over Phil baby shock 
MORE: No, EastEnders didn’t make a ‘major blunder’ with Mick Carter and Vincent Hubbard’s jogging scenes
